heystac:checks.message:
Validation failed for Collection with ID landsat-c2l1 against schema at https://schemas.stacspec.org/v1.0.0/collection-spec/json-schema/collection.json
'https://d9-wret.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/assets/palladium/production/s3fs-public/atoms/files/Landsat_Data_Policy.pdf' does not match '^[\\w\\-\\.\\+]+$'

Failed validating 'pattern' in schema['allOf'][0]['properties']['license']:
    {'title': 'Collection License Name',
     'type': 'string',
     'pattern': '^[\\w\\-\\.\\+]+$'}

On instance['license']:
    'https://d9-wret.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/assets/palladium/production/s3fs-public/atoms/files/Landsat_Data_Policy.pdf'

title: Landsat Collection 2 Level-1 Product
description: The Landsat Level-1 product is a top of atmosphere product distributed as scaled and calibrated digital numbers.
